name: Marco Lusetti
goal: we promote the European Commission Opportunities to the enterprises and no profit and cultural associations, especially in the sectors listed below: Erasmus for Young Enterpreneurs, Europe for Citizens, Creative Europe, Horizon 2020, Covenant of Mayors, SME Instruments Phase 1 and Phase 2
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Covenant of Mayors, Erasmus for Young Enterpreneurs, Sme Instruments Phase 1 and Phase 2, Energy efficiency, Smart Cities and Communities, External Action Services, Enlargement
